questions.question: What is the primary purpose of software engineering?
answers: To create and maintain software efficiently

questions.question: Which software development model follows a sequential approach?
What does MVC stand for in software design?
Which of these is a design pattern?
Which phase is not part of the software development lifecycle (SDLC)?
What is the primary goal of unit testing?
answers: To verify individual components of the software
To test the application's user interface

questions.question: What does the acronym SOLID stand for in software engineering?
answers: Single Responsibility, Open-Closed, Liskov Substitution, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion
Structured Object Layout and Integration Design

questions.question: What is the purpose of a design pattern?
answers: To provide a reusable solution to a common software problem
To develop unique software for every project

questions.question: What does CAPTCHA stand for?
answers: Computerized Automated Process to Analyze Testable Humans and Algorithms
Controlled Application of Processing Technology for Cognitive Analysis
Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart
Cybernetic Analysis Program for Testing Human Access
questions.correct_ans: Completely Automated Public Turing test to tell Computers and Humans Apart
